description.raw:
Add categories, if present, to a new model during upload.

Requires: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/176/adding-categories-to-fuel_metadataproto/diff

## Minimal test

 `mkdir ~/sun1`

`echo "<?xml version='1.0' ?><sdf version='1.6'><model name='Sun1'></model></sdf>" > ~/sun1/model.sdf`

`echo "model { file: 'model.sdf' file_format { version { major: 1 minor: 6 } name: 'sdf' } } name: 'Sun1' description: 'Fake sun.' authors { name: 'Billy' email: 'billy@amail.org' } categories { first: 'animals' second: 'architecture' }" > ~/sun1/metadata.pbtxt`

`ign fuel upload -m ~/sun1 -u https://staging-fuel.ignitionrobotics.org --header "Private-Token: <YOUR_TOKEN>"`

Check out your model on https://staging-app.ignitionrobotics.org.

ign fuel upload -m ~/sun1 -u https://staging-fuel.ignitionrobotics.org --header "Private-Token: <YOUR_TOKEN>"
